DVD Import: Godzilla Vs. Biolante

By Kojin on Saturday, April 29, 2006 - 05:48 am:

Every Import DVD or Burned DVD gives a Gurlock from my experience... my own Demo Reel gave me one!

By Doc Ido on Thursday, August 31, 2006 - 03:22 pm:

By sunfox on Saturday, September 30, 2006 - 04:57 pm:

Japanese Import: Bruce Lee Enter the Dragon

By unpatrioticproductions on Friday, February 24, 2012 - 02:43 pm:

Maybe it's my PS2 but I've used imported DVDs and got different monsters:

I got a MellonCho from Froken Sverige (translates as Miss Sweden) which is a Swedish Region 2 DVD.

I used the Swedish Region 2 DVD for Lilya 4-Ever and it's a locked monster (I have yet to unlock whatever monster is on it). Seeing as it's locked, that means it's not a dragon therefore, Lilya 4-Ever doesn't make this monster either, at least when I use it on my PS2.

Judging from what people have posted, maybe it's just Japanese DVDs that give this monster.
